summary: WIRING HARNESS ON MY 1995 MERCEDES E320 HAS DETERIORATED AND NEEDS REPLACEMENT AT MY EXPENSE AS PER MERCEDES DEALER.  THE CAR STALLS AND IS A SAFETY AND FIRE HAZARD.  ONBOARD DIAGNOSTICS ARE RENDERED USELESS.  IT IS AN OBVIOUS MATERIALS OR MANUFACTURING DEFECT.  PROBLEM IS WELL KNOWN BY MECHANICS, BUT DENIED BY DEALER SERVICE MANAGER. *JB
